products.title: Vanita Golden Barley Roman Blind
products.description: If your looking for a contemporary twist on a classic neutral the vanita golden barley roman blind is the perfect choice. Versatile, natural and perfect for any decor, this blind enjoys a rich texture with a subtle shine that will perfectly complement almost any scheme. Style if your looking for a contemporary twist on a classic neutral the vanita golden barley roman blind is the perfect choice.

products.title: Guarda Stripe, Grey - Roman Blind
products.description: The subtle latte brown and dove grey colour palette of the guarda stripe in grey is versatile enough to work in most dcor schemes, whilst the off-white background and occasional jet black stripe offset the colours perfectly. Use the grey to create a strong, moody style in a den or study. Embrace the colour scheme and opt for grey walls and black and white accessories, using the odd light wood to bring out the unusual tan tone in the blind.

products.title: Guarda Stripe, Cornflower - Roman Blind
products.description: Blending soft latte with a pretty cornflower blue, all on a white base, the guarda stripe in cornflower has a laid-back feel about it that would lend itself to a nautical theme or casually worn look in a home. Shabby chic your living room by including the cornflower and surrounding it with worn woods, vintage finds, and antique furniture. Go for natural floorboards and pale blue walls, accessorising throughout with varying shades of sky and sea blue.

products.title: Guarda Stripe, Indigo - Roman Blind
products.description: A contemporary blue and grey combo, the guarda stripe in indigo offers roughly painted stripes on a white background, giving an artistic look and feel to this roman blind. The cotton fabric sits neatly into roman folds, and you'll find it simple and easy to use. The indigo would make the ideal addition to a child's or teenager's bedroom, where soft grey walls will provide the perfect base for bolder blue tones in the form of wall art, toys, and ornaments.

products.title: Como, Grape - Roman Blind
products.description: Muted grape purple and softened charcoal grey make the perfect colour combination for this roman blind from the como range, and sit prettily against the soft cream background. The watercolour look of these gorgeous blossoms only add to the delicate look of the piece. Give your living room a purple-toned makeover by going all out and hanging the grape against a matching purple feature wall. The look will be striking and unmissable, yet tempered by the fragility of the florals and the gentle tone of the cream background.

products.title: Como, Cornflower - Roman Blind
products.description: Gorgeous cornflower blue gives this pretty roman blind from the como range its completely apt name. The rich cream background and grey-taupe foliage offset the delicate blue shade perfectly, giving the blind a soft yet refreshing look. The cornflower would be right at home in the bathroom, against white, cream, or pale aqua walls, a white bathroom suite, and white or patterned tiling. Make this shade of blue your colour of choice when it comes to towels and accessories for a prettily coordinated feel.

products.title: Guarda Stripe, Cherry - Roman Blind
products.description: Blending bold cherry red with candy red and dove grey, and placing them on a creamy white background, the guarda stripe cherry is a bright and eye-catching roman blind with plenty of colour and character. Pair with a modern red kitchen fit, opting for white walls and red units. Choose lighter woods for a contemporary look, and accessorise throughout the room with various shades of red, charcoal, and dove grey.

products.title: Como, Grey - Roman Blind
products.description: The monochrome look of the como in grey gives this pretty range of roman blinds a whole new dimension. The off-white background provides the perfect base for the soft charcoal of the floral imagery, with the delicate watercolour look standing out beautifully. If monochrome is your thing, add the grey to a pale grey or deep charcoal wall to provide light relief, keeping all furniture, soft furnishings, and ornaments to black, grey, and white shades.

products.title: Como, Ochre - Roman Blind
products.description: Aptly named, the como in ochre offers pretty blossoms in ochre, mustard, and lemon yellows, accompanied by foliage in a soft mid-grey tone. The cream background provides an attractive contrast and the look is one of sunny cheer. Yellow and grey makes an ideal colour combination for a calming office or home study, so settle the ochre against a palest grey walls, opting for contemporary furniture with clean, straight lines.

products.title: Guarda Stripe, Ochre - Roman Blind
products.description: A summery combination of ochre yellow, sunny lemon, and soft dove grey, the stripes of the guarda stripe in ochre sit casually on a creamy white background and the outcome is soft and appealing, perfect for the modern home. Brighten up your kitchen by teaming the ochre with cream units and yellow walls. Choose appliances, utensils, and tea towels in matching greys and yellows, and keep wooden furniture light and contemporary.

products.title: Guarda Stripe, Grape - Roman Blind
products.description: If purple's your thing, then the guarda stripe in grape is for you. A creamy white background, striped with lines of various thicknesses and in shades of grape, mauve, and stone, this is a truly modern blind with bags of personality. Use the grape to accent a purple and grey dcorated living room, opting for a mixture of white and grey walls, grey sofas, and a purple and grey rug. Throw in some grape throws and cushions for extra comfort.

products.title: Monkeying Around, Lagoon - Roman Blind
products.description: The uniquely characterful pattern of the monkeying around lagoon features illustrations of black and white monkeys in teal-toned trees, ornately displayed on a bright turquoise background. Perfect for monkey lovers, this blind is pretty as a picture. Your little one might just fall in love with the sweet critters of the lagoon so hang it in their room amidst off-white walls with one feature wall in grey or turquoise to be used as a focal point for the room.

products.title: Monkeying Around, Mineral - Roman Blind
products.description: On a stone grey background sit black and white monkeys upon turquoise and white foliage, and this tropical display is the monkeying around in mineral. The ornately drawn leaves add a pretty touch, whilst the monkeys have a sense of fun and character. Use the mineral to give your downstairs cloakroom a colourful lift, going for a vibrant turquoise feature wall if you dare, and keeping the remainder of the room painted white.

products.title: Monkeying Around, Nectar - Roman Blind
products.description: The monkeying around in nectar features a pretty biscuit base adorned with the range's signature monkey illustrations and tree imagery, in a chocolatey grey and soft white. The pattern is ornate and eye-catching, resulting in a unique look that will bring any home to life. The sweet monkeys of the nectar would be right at home in a neutrally toned dining room, where woods and wickers take centre stage and are accented by brown, gold, and camel tones, occasionally tempered by a rich cream hue for balance.

products.title: Narvik, Seafoam - Roman Blind
products.description: Bring a touch of natural blue to your home with the narvik seafoam, which boasts a muted aqua blue shade adorned with creamy off-white illustrations of birds, flowers, and leaves. And, made from 100% cotton and with a tightly woven texture, you can be sure of quality that will last. Use the seafoam in a classically turquoise or aqua bathroom where, surrounded by a white suite, walls, and tiles, the colour will simply pop.

products.title: Etched Vine, Eau De Nil - Roman Blind
products.description: Subtly elegant, the etched vine in eau de nil blends a pale aqua green background with delicate floral imagery in ivory greys and whites. The outcome is one of understated sophistication and will work as part of a classic dcor scheme. Mix the eau de nil with similar green tones in a living room for a relaxed and luxurious look and feel. Go for ivory walls and wooden floors, with a large coloured rug on top.

products.title: Etched Vine, Sandstone - Roman Blind
products.description: On a sandy oatmeal base, the etched fern in sandstone displays intricately drawn florals in soft shades of white and charcoal, forming a delicate canvas of blossoms that will look pretty anywhere it's placed. Sit the sandstone against a deep chocolate feature wall, allowing the blind to offset the rich tone beautifully. Paint the remainder of the walls in a creamy white or barely there oatmeal, making for a cosy yet natural theme for a guest or master bedroom, or even a living room.

products.title: Narvik, Grey - Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring sweet bird images, alongside cutely styled flowers and leaves, the narvik in grey makes for a pretty and welcoming roman blind. The grey background makes this a versatile piece that will work as part of a number of dcor and colour schemes. Hang the grey in your home study, going for a bold feature wall in sunny yellow, with white paint on the remaining walls. Opt for lightly coloured furniture with clean, sharp lines, and accent throughout the room with matching yellows, greys, and whites.

products.title: Narvik, Blue - Roman Blind
products.description: There are shades of blue, and then there is muted sky blue, with its understated richness and dreamy toning. Enter narvik blue, a gorgeously woven cotton fabric featuring a stunningly natural sky blue tone adorned with off-white birds, florals, and foliage. This simple yet effective design will add some cutesy yet contemporary flavour to any home. Hang the blue in a fresh and vibrant living room, against soft white walls and with varying shades of blue throughout.

products.title: Poppy Pod, Colonial - Roman Blind
products.description: Poppy pod colonial catches the eye for all the right reasons the moment you walk in the door. The gentle greens sit majestically on the calming cream canvas to create a natural look that makes you feel at home as soon as you set eyes on it. Combine your new favourite fabric with a matching set of green scatter cushions and a cream throw over the back of a cracked leather couch. For extra style points you can swap your light bulbs for warm white candle lights to create that snug and cosy atmosphere you've always wanted.

products.title: Caracus, South Pacific - Roman Blind
products.description: Caracus south pacific is the perfect compliment to the contemporary home that you've been searching for. As you sit back and take in the sketched style of printing, you come to appreciate the subtlety that goes into bringing such a minimalist design to life. When you combine your new favourite fabric with some matching greens and blues you'll be able to create a style synergy that will instantly have you at ease.

products.title: Faux Silk Crush Platinum Roman Blind
products.description: Give your room a startling metallic finish with this beautiful faux silk crush platinum roman blind. The shimmering silver highlights of the faux-silk platinum body and velvet shimmer beautifully as they catch the light, creating a truly glamorous and eye-catching effect in you give your room a startling metallic finish with this beautiful faux silk crush platinum roman blind.

products.title: Fraser Olive Roman Blind
products.description: Add something a little fresh to your windows with this beautiful fraser olive roman blind. A blend of light colours that are neutral enough to match with most design schemes but also interesting and fun. The simple checked pattern is picked out in the lightest blush pink and a ri add something a little fresh to your windows with this beautiful fraser olive roman blind.

products.title: Aquila Duck Egg Roman Blind
products.description: This aquila roman blind is certainly unique. If you're looking to add texture to your home then this fabric is ideal. It features a mess of raised stripes all higgledy piggledy that run vertically along the blind, creating plenty of interest. It's also picked out in wonderfully c this aquila roman blind is certainly unique.

products.title: Gainsborough Mulberry Roman Blind
products.description: A classic pattern in a modern palette is the perfect way to dress your home. This gainsborough mulberry roman blind takes traditional tartan and infuses it with rich berry shades alongside neutral and natural tones to great effect. The end result is a beautiful, cosy window dress a classic pattern in a modern palette is the perfect way to dress your home.

products.title: Sophie Mustard Roman Blind
products.description: What a way to brighten up your day. Add sophie mustard to your windows and youll be waking up every morning feeling energised and alive. Not only that, mustard is right on trend these days so youll get all that designer style too. Pair it with light neutrals, gentle greys or what a way to brighten up your day.

products.title: Sophie Mauve Roman Blind
products.description: Purple is a lovely opulent colour; its got that classical charm that feels soft yet sophisticated. This particular mauve shade is perfect for creating a classy and homely snug just for you. Their sophie fabric comes with plenty of texture too which gives it a bit more of a mode purple is a lovely opulent colour; its got that classical charm that feels soft yet sophisticated.

products.title: Fandango, Marine - Roman Blind
products.description: You'll fall in love with the tropical blues and greens featured in the fandango marine. Think turquoises and ocean blues, tempered only by mustard taupes and indigo greys. The cotton fabric folds neatly into pretty roman folds, only serving to accentuate the pretty pattern of the blind. Add the marine to your kitchen for a fun and unusual culinary colour scheme. Surround with ice whites to help those colours pop, and accent throughout with matching teals, sea blues, and aqua greens.

products.title: Amelie, Pebble - Roman Blind
products.description: Fusing rustic style with monochrome chic, the amelie in pebble is a wild and wistful piece, consisting of lightly sketched florals in jet blacks and barely-there greys bedded on a grainy, oatmeal linen. Adopt a modern take on country flair in your master or guest bedroom by hanging the pebble amidst finished woods and painted wickers. Accompany the scheme with brushed silver finishings, adding a deep red, sage green, or rustic heather if you can't resist a splurge of colour.

products.title: Crushed Velvet, Ruby - Roman Blind
products.description: In brightest pillarbox red, the lustre ruby offers a lush canvas of soft, velvety fabric, glossy and light-catching as it moves. Impossible to miss, this blind will provide a bold burst of colour, livening up any space in which it's hung. The traditionally textured ruby can be used even in modern decor schemes. Team it with stark white walls and ebony black furnishings for a luxurious take on monochromatic minimalism.

products.title: Crushed Velvet, Steel - Roman Blind
products.description: Generate an indulgent and contemporary space by adding the lustre in steel, a roman blind made from a lavish, velvety thread to form a dramatic look with sumptuous fabrics in smoky silver with blue hues and a modern metallic sheen. Include the regal steel in a subtle white and grey bedroom for a cultured and classy theme, adding blends of plush, textured fabrics and cotton-fresh linens for an inviting finish.

products.title: Maurice, Lime - Roman Blind
products.description: Build a space full of comfort and class with the maurice in lime, where a combination of fine, silky threads form a plush and downy blind for a luxury look. The reviving, muted green influence creates a fresh finish on lavishly textured cloth. Create a feeling of classic sophistication in your master bedroom by hanging the lime against walls painted in a soothing, silky satin. Draw out the hues of the blind by featuring olive, silver, and yellow hues in your bedlinen, rugs, and accessories.

products.title: Maurice, Red - Roman Blind
products.description: Feature the maurice in red to your dcor for an appeasing and alluring finish, where a fusion of plush threads form a distinctive downy blind with sumptuous texture and regal style, in an enchanting shade of vibrant cherry red. Create a pretty and modern theme in a fresh white bedroom with a luscious fruity red shade, by blending the delightful red with similarly blushed tones of rosy pink and cerise, adding charming character by including dainty flora and cutesy prints.

products.title: Amelie, Mulberry - Roman Blind
products.description: The amelie mulberry completely encompasses true country style. Sat on a bed of grainy oatmeal are blossoming florals in a faded forest green and pretty lilacs and heathers. The rustic aesthetic is neatened somewhat by the structured arches of the roman, creating a sumptuous yet rural theme that will suit any country home. Bring your country kitchen to life by joining the mulberry with the natural weaves of wicker and hessian and accompanying with rustic, unfinished woods.

products.title: Maurice, Raspberry - Roman Blind
products.description: Produce a dramatic and inviting living space with the maurice in raspberry, where comforting texture meets daring and confident colour, through plush, silky threads for a luxuriant look in a commanding shade of berry red. For an attractive and romantic finish in a basic, white guest bedroom, add the vibrant raspberry shade with blush-toned fabrics and knick-knacks in rose hues and poppy reds, being sure to include dainty florals and quilted fabrics for a cosy feel with texture and a hint of charming, creative character.

products.title: Maurice, Black - Roman Blind
products.description: The pure ebony of the maurice in black provides a bold statement to an otherwise forgiving and opulent cloth. This is a modern blind made from fine, silky threads to form a grand design with a distinctive and contemporary colour. Combine the striking black with a vibrant burst of teal or emerald for a modern look with reviving colour, forming a welcoming and cosy style by including equally elaborate fabrics with rich and restful textures.

products.title: Maurice, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: Combining modern, textured cloth with stark colour, it doesn't get much more contemporary than the maurice in charcoal. The moody slate grey makes a striking statement against the soft and silky feel of this blind, forming a cosy look with daring shade. Add luxury and elegance to either a contemporary bedroom or traditional living room by hanging the fearless black amongst soothing walls in either dove grey or white, and incorporating alike textured fabrics for a cosy feel with a sophisticated finish.

products.title: Aquataine, Rose - Roman Blind
products.description: Fusing vintage tones of taupe and pink, the aquataine rose has a gorgeously romantic aesthetic, full of charm and prettiness all the way through. The blooming florals sit sweetly on this soft linen, which gathers neatly into the roman's pleats. Opt for an untraditional colour scheme in the dining room, using the pink and brown from the blind as your key colours. Choose creamy white walls, then match dark furniture to the brown and sumptuous fabrics and accessories to the pink.

products.title: Maurice, Teal - Roman Blind
products.description: Adorn your windows in voluptuous cloth with the maurice in teal, a gorgeous roman blind made from a fine, downy thread to form a plentiful blind with a receptive and comforting touch. Its rich and alluring, modern colour gives a stylish and welcoming feel. For everlasting, modern style, mix the vibrant teal with luscious back notes of chocolate brown and creamy caramel, adding distinctive colour with alike, azure-toned floral prints and soft furnishings for a themed colour scheme with added cosiness and charisma.

products.title: Maurice, Aubergine - Roman Blind
products.description: Generate a demanding and charismatic dcor scheme with the bold maurice in aubergine, flaunting a dramatic shade of mauve. Crafted from a thick, downy thread, this substantial blind offers sumptuous texture and an alluring, silky sheen. Enhance the deep aubergine with equally valiant maroon and wine-toned fabrics for a common and distinctive theme full of punchy colour. Stick to an understated white and contemporary dove grey background for a modern style that will look fantastic with all of the added tones and textures.

products.title: Maurice, Caramel - Roman Blind
products.description: Impress your guests with the elegant and alluring maurice in caramel, showcasing a sophisticated neutral shade of honeyed beige and presented on a plush, velvety cloth made from silky thread for enriching texture and a tempting golden sheen. Merge the glossy caramel with beguiling shades of buttery cream, taupe, and mocha for a heavenly and inviting palette. Incorporate soft furnishings and plush throws with dreamy, downy textures, adding eye-catching gilded ornaments and golden accessories for a luxuriant finish with traditional style.

products.title: Maurice, Mink - Roman Blind
products.description: For a comforting and inviting haven, add the exquisite fabric of the maurice in mink, made from a blend of plush, cushioned threads to form a dreamy blind with deluxe texture and a sophisticated finish in a warming shade of honeyed oatmeal. Combine the delectable tone of the mink with creamy hues of ivory, biscuit, and taupe for a sophisticated and wholesome palette. Add layers of sumptuous linens and heavenly plush fabrics for both comfort and depth, and gold-leaf for a touch of luxe.

products.title: Maurice, Cream - Roman Blind
products.description: Fashion a luxury dcor scheme using the maurice in cream, where a lavish combination of silky threads form an elegant blind with sumptuous texture, containing a nourishing cream shade to create opulent style with a comforting and welcoming fabric. Form a grand and eye-catching theme by combining the plush cloth of the cream with alike textured materials and soft furnishings in a soothing traditional palette of cream, taupe, and gold.

products.title: Seaside Huts Pink Roman Blind
products.description: The seaside huts is a wonderful blind range with the cute pattern of little houses. Being at the seaside is fantastic. It is even better to bring the feeling of being at the seaside to your home with this multicoloured roller blind. products.description: The milky way range has a wonderful star pattern that will add something different to your dcor. products.description: The fancy pattern which comes with the aarlborg range is a reason to buy it, at an affordable price the aarlborg range would fit perfectly in any room.
